scripts.validate:clinical: npm run test:clinical && echo '✅ Clinical accuracy tests passed'
scripts.validate:accessibility: npm run test:accessibility && echo '✅ Accessibility tests passed'
scripts.validate:performance: npm run test:performance && echo '✅ Performance tests passed'
scripts.perf:all: npm run perf:breathing && npm run perf:crisis && npm run perf:launch
scripts.perf:monitor: node -e "console.log('Performance monitoring tools available in PerformanceMonitor.ts')"
scripts.validate:encryption: ts-node scripts/validate-encryption.ts && echo '✅ Encryption validation passed'
scripts.validate:types: ts-node scripts/validate-types.ts && echo '✅ TypeScript clinical validation passed'
scripts.validate:clinical-complete: npm run validate:types && npm run test:clinical && echo '✅ Complete clinical accuracy validation passed'
scripts.validate:sessions: npm run test:sessions && echo '✅ Session tests passed'
scripts.validate:session-clinical: npm run test:session-clinical && echo '✅ Session clinical accuracy tests passed'
scripts.validate:widget: npm run test:widget && echo '✅ Widget integration tests passed'
scripts.validate:widget-clinical: npm run test:widget-security && npm run test:widget-comprehensive && echo '✅ Widget clinical validation passed'
scripts.validate:widget-performance: npm run test:widget-performance && echo '✅ Widget performance validation passed'
scripts.validate:widget-complete: npm run validate:widget-clinical && npm run validate:widget-performance && npm run test:widget-accessibility && npm run test:widget-e2e && echo '✅ Complete widget validation passed'
scripts.validate:payment: npm run test:payment && echo '✅ Payment integration tests passed'
scripts.validate:payment-security: npm run test:payment-security && echo '✅ Payment security validation passed'
scripts.validate:payment-crisis: npm run test:payment-crisis && echo '✅ Payment crisis safety validation passed'
scripts.validate:payment-complete: npm run validate:payment-security && npm run validate:payment-crisis && npm run test:payment-api && npm run test:payment-e2e && echo '✅ Complete payment validation passed'
scripts.validate:offline: npm run test:offline && echo '✅ Offline scenario tests passed'
scripts.validate:offline-crisis: npm run test:offline-crisis && echo '✅ Offline crisis management validation passed'
scripts.validate:offline-clinical: npm run test:offline-therapeutic && npm run test:offline-crisis && echo '✅ Offline clinical validation passed'
scripts.validate:offline-performance: npm run test:offline-performance && echo '✅ Offline performance validation passed'
scripts.validate:offline-complete: npm run test:offline-scenarios && npm run test:offline-integration && npm run validate:offline-clinical && npm run validate:offline-performance && echo '✅ Complete offline validation passed'
scripts.validate:feature-flags: npm run test:feature-flags && echo '✅ Feature flag tests passed'
scripts.validate:feature-flags-critical: npm run test:feature-flags-crisis && npm run test:feature-flags-offline && echo '✅ Critical feature flag validation passed'
scripts.validate:feature-flags-complete: npm run test:feature-flags-unit && npm run test:feature-flags-integration && npm run test:feature-flags-e2e && echo '✅ Complete feature flag validation passed'
scripts.validate:webhook: npm run test:webhook && echo '✅ Webhook UI tests passed'
scripts.validate:webhook-crisis: npm run test:webhook-crisis && echo '✅ Webhook crisis safety validation passed'
scripts.validate:webhook-accessibility: npm run test:webhook-accessibility && echo '✅ Webhook accessibility validation passed'
scripts.validate:webhook-therapeutic: npm run test:webhook-therapeutic && echo '✅ Webhook therapeutic validation passed'
scripts.validate:webhook-performance: npm run test:webhook-performance && echo '✅ Webhook performance validation passed'
scripts.validate:webhook-user-acceptance: npm run test:webhook-user-acceptance && echo '✅ Webhook user acceptance validation passed'
scripts.validate:crisis-authority: npm run test:crisis && npm run perf:crisis && echo '✅ Crisis Authority validation passed'
scripts.validate:compliance-authority: npm run test:encryption && npm run test:secure-storage && echo '✅ Compliance Authority validation passed'
scripts.validate:clinical-authority: npm run validate:clinical-complete && echo '✅ Clinical Authority validation passed'
scripts.validate:production-readiness: npm run validate:crisis-authority && npm run validate:compliance-authority && npm run validate:clinical-authority && echo '✅ Production readiness validated'
scripts.monitor:production: node -e "console.log('Production monitoring available at /monitoring/dashboard'); console.log('Real-time metrics, alerts, and emergency procedures active');"
scripts.validate:webhook-e2e: npm run test:webhook-e2e && echo '✅ Webhook end-to-end validation passed'
scripts.validate:webhook-critical: npm run validate:webhook-crisis && npm run validate:webhook-accessibility && npm run validate:webhook-therapeutic && echo '✅ Critical webhook validation passed'
scripts.validate:security: npm run test:security && echo '✅ Security tests passed'
scripts.validate:security-comprehensive: npm run test:security-comprehensive && echo '✅ Comprehensive security validation passed'
scripts.validate:security-regression: npm run test:security-regression && echo '✅ Security regression validation passed'
scripts.validate:compliance: npm run test:compliance && echo '✅ Compliance validation passed'
scripts.validate:compliance-hipaa: npm run test:compliance-hipaa && echo '✅ HIPAA compliance validation passed'
scripts.validate:compliance-pci: npm run test:compliance-pci && echo '✅ PCI DSS compliance validation passed'
scripts.validate:security-integration: npm run test:security-integration && echo '✅ Security integration validation passed'
scripts.validate:security-critical: npm run validate:security-comprehensive && npm run validate:compliance && npm run validate:security-regression && echo '✅ Critical security validation passed'
scripts.validate:new-architecture: ts-node scripts/validate-new-architecture.ts && echo '✅ New Architecture validation passed'
scripts.perf:new-architecture: npm run validate:new-architecture && npm run perf:all && echo '✅ New Architecture performance validation passed'
scripts.perf:new-arch-baseline: tsx scripts/new-architecture-performance-baseline.ts && echo '✅ New Architecture baseline established'
scripts.perf:new-arch-baseline-detailed: tsx scripts/new-architecture-performance-baseline.ts --detailed --export-report && echo '✅ Detailed New Architecture baseline completed'
scripts.perf:new-arch-quick: tsx scripts/new-architecture-performance-baseline.ts --quick && echo '✅ Quick New Architecture validation completed'
scripts.validate:new-arch-therapeutic: npm run test:new-arch-crisis && npm run test:new-arch-breathing && echo '✅ New Architecture therapeutic validation passed'
scripts.validate:new-arch-performance: npm run test:new-architecture && npm run perf:new-arch-baseline && echo '✅ New Architecture performance validation passed'
scripts.validate:new-arch-complete: npm run validate:new-arch-therapeutic && npm run validate:new-arch-performance && npm run test:new-arch-comprehensive && echo '✅ Complete New Architecture validation passed'
scripts.precommit: npm run typecheck:strict && npm run lint:clinical && npm run validate:types && npm run test:clinical && npm run test:unit
scripts.prepush: npm run test:ci && npm run validate:clinical-complete
scripts.version-check: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); if(pkg.dependencies.react !== '19.1.0') throw new Error('React must be 19.1.0 for RN 0.81.4 compatibility')"
